verbs.description: Just hours after [V: launching] [ARG1: a vicious attack on U.S. allies] [ARGM-TMP: after the disastrous G-7 Summit in Canada] , [ARG0: President Donald Trump] praised North Korean leader Kim Jong Un and predicted the United States will have a “ terrific relationship ” as the two leaders started their historic summit in Singapore on Tuesday .
